text_block_list.text: Yaeno Muteki was troubled about being unable to control her emotions during races. In regards to thinking of a countermeasure for her――
Actually, there was one thing I had in mind that might work.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: ……『I want to know more about the Kongou Yaegaki Ryuu』, is it？
She was pretty wild when she was younger. The day I met her too, she was practicing Kata in order help keep her emotions in check during the Selection Race.
Up until now those unruly instincts of hers―― without a doubt, must have been held in check by this 『Ardent Flame』 and the teachings of the Kongou Yaegaki Ryuu.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: So, in other words, in regards to controlling the 『Ardent Flame』 during a race, within the Kongou Yaegaki Ryuu, you believe there is a hint？

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: ……that seems reasonable. Well then――

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Instructor, assistant instructor. I have returned. For today, thank you kindly for your guidance.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki's Grandmother
text_block_list.text: Welcome, thank you for coming, Trainer-san. Please feel free to ask anything about the teachings of the Kongou Yaegaki Ryuu.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki's Grandmother
text_block_list.text: Seeing is believing…… by all means, today, make the most of this experience
And, with that said……！

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Sei！ ……Haa！！

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki's Grandmother
text_block_list.text: Yes, just like that. Now, step and lean forward to match with your fist. Rather than lifting your head, it should feel more like you're being pulled along.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki's Grandfather
text_block_list.text: Yaeno, lower your hips more！！ With a sharper swing, once more！

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Yes！ Thank you！！
While it was extremely simple sounding, together with Yaeno Muteki, I trained by performing the Kongou Yaegaki Ryuu Kata.
……that said, moving around in a way I wasn't accustomed to depleted my stamina a lot quicker than I expected. After that, I ended up just observing, that's when――

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki's Grandfather
text_block_list.text: Do you have a moment？
It seems that the guidance was left to the assistant instructor, his wife, as the Kongou Yaegaki Ryuu instructor―― Yaeno Muteki's grandfather, quietly started a conversation.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki's Grandfather
text_block_list.text: ……for being concerned about my granddaughter, I'm grateful.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki's Grandfather
text_block_list.text: Most people―― in regards to races, are perplexed by their own 『Ardent Flame』, and are often seeking out that 『Tranquil Water』, what do you think?

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki's Grandfather
text_block_list.text: Aah, as I thought. ……her movements are stiff. Her follow-through is shallow. From Yaeno, right now, I can sense a feeling of fear.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki's Grandfather
text_block_list.text: The 『Ardent Flame』, it must be because she's been continuously troubled by them, but she has been fixating on the 『Tranquil Water』 too much. ……However, Trainer-san.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki's Grandfather
text_block_list.text: ――『The Fusion of Fire and Water, Becomes A Safeguard』

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki's Grandfather
text_block_list.text: The Kongou Yaegaki Ryuu is a style that attaches great importance to protection. These words represent the essential understanding required to realize that protection.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki's Grandfather
text_block_list.text: Being like the 『Ardent Flame』 is not limited to having an intense fighting spirit, without the will to protect, it can easily collapse.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki's Grandfather
text_block_list.text: In the same vein, the 『Tranquil Water』 is not limited to a serene reasonableness, which leads to hesitation in the face of hardship, resulting in being one step too late to protect……――

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki's Grandfather
text_block_list.text: 『The Fusion of Fire and Water』 is, the balance between the 『Ardent Flame』 and 『Tranquil Water』, so that when the time comes, one can protect without hesitation.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki's Grandfather
text_block_list.text: For our style, we perform the 『Kata』 to cleanse the mind and body, in order to facilitate 『The Fusion of Fire and Water』.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki's Grandfather
text_block_list.text: ――have you understood it so far？ To control the 『Ardent Flames』 does not mean, use the 『Tranquil Water』 to restrain it, it does not mean to drown it out.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki's Grandfather
text_block_list.text: Whether it be martial arts or a race, it is the same. The aim should be 『Fusion』. In what way should that be realized……

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: During a race, how to realize 『The Fusion of Fire and Water』…… is it? I see――

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: I have spoken with my grandfather about this before, however, in regards to the Kongou Yaegaki Ryuu, we use the 『Kata』 to realize this.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: In that case, what would the 『Kata』 be for a race……？
For martial arts, 『Kata』 are based on hypothetical conditions and opponents, much like a simulation to choose the most optimal action to undertake.
If one were to adapt these for the purpose of a race, then the thing that comes to mind is――

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: That's right……！ To surpass the opponents, the 『Ardent Flame』！ To calmly analyze and grasp the situation, the 『Tranquil Water』！！

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: To combine these two, a 『Kata』―― With consideration for both the settings and conditions, a variety of 『Tactics』……！

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: In other words, for a race 『The Fusion of Fire and Water』 can be realized, by learning many different 『Tactics』……！！

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: I now have a guiding light. In that case, what I need next is――

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: ……an expert familiar with this road, that can instruct me.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Those with the title of trainer are, in regards to race tactics, considered those most proficient at it.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Please, for just a little while longer, consider accompanying someone as immature as I.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: The 『Kata』 for races…… in other words, the many 『Tactics』, please instruct me on them！
choice_data_list: Got it, leave it to me！
Got it, leave it to me！

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Thank you very much. ……a response overflowing in sincerity―― it's very reassuring.
Will Yaeno Muteki be able to realize 『The Fusion of Fire and Water』 using tactics for a race？ ……The first step is to instruct her properly！
